name: Break the Wall (itch)
description:
The Classic Arcade Game of Break the Wall is back again with a lot of fun.Enjoy the cool Graphics & simple yet attractive layout for this free game .

Game Play instructions

# Break the wall to get points.
# The Speed of ball increases after each stroke.
# Brick's on the wall have separate points according to their colour.
# You can get lives by hitting the heart brick & get an extra ball for hitting special ball brick.
# The size of the bat can also be increased by hitting special brick on break the wall.
# Try to complete levels at minimum possible time to get high scores.
# Share high scores with your friends & family on facebook.
# Many exciting levels & many more to come on this free game.

Enjoy this free classic arcade game & tell us how you feel about break the wall
Give us reviews for your experience about break the wall & we will be happy to make creative changes to this free classic arcade game based on your inputs.
